publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4889.1 Mr Brian Monteith: Stirling Livestock Market—As an amendment to motion (S2M-4889) in the name of Bruce Crawford, after second "Stirling" insert "notes that the decision was taken by the casting vote of the planning committee’s Labour Convener, with the voting split John Paterson (Labour), Tom Coll (Labour), Tom Hazell (Labour) and the Convener, Charles McKean (Labour), for and John Holliday (Conservative), Gerry Power (Conservative), Anne Harding (Conservative) and Scott Farmer (SNP) against". Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-4889.1 Mr Brian Monteith: Stirling Livestock Market—As an amendment to motion (S2M-4889) in the name of Bruce Crawford, after second "Stirling" insert "notes that the decision was taken by the casting vote of the planning committee’s Labour Convener, with the voting split John Paterson (Labour), Tom Coll (Labour), Tom Hazell (Labour) and the Convener, Charles McKean (Labour), for and John Holliday (Conservative), Gerry Power (Conservative), Anne Harding (Conservative) and Scott Farmer (SNP) against".
